mapper.select: SELECT lodging_code, local_status, lodging_category, fk_companyid, lodging_name, lodging_tell, lodging_content, lodging_address, main_img, filename, orgfilename, filesize, status FROM ( SELECT rownum AS RNO , lodging_code, local_status, lodging_category, fk_companyid, lodging_name, lodging_tell, lodging_content, lodging_address, main_img, filename, orgfilename, filesize, status, feedback_msg FROM ( select lodging_code, local_status, lodging_category, fk_companyid, lodging_name, lodging_tell, lodging_content, lodging_address, main_img, filename, orgfilename, filesize, status, feedback_msg from tbl_lodging where status = #{choice_status} order by lodging_code asc )V ) T WHERE RNO between #{startRno} and #{endRno}

select status as status, count(status) as count_status from tbl_lodging where fk_companyid = #{companyid} group by status

SELECT userid, email, user_name, mobile, address, detail_address, gender, to_char(registerday,'yyyy-mm-dd') as registerday, status, idle FROM ( SELECT rownum AS RNO , userid, email, user_name, mobile, address, detail_address, gender, registerday, status, idle FROM ( select userid, email, user_name, mobile, address, detail_address, gender, registerday, status, idle from tbl_member order by registerday desc )V ) T where RNO between #{startRno} and #{endRno}

SELECT companyid, company_name, email, mobile, registerday, status, idle FROM ( SELECT rownum AS RNO , companyid, company_name, email, mobile, registerday, status, idle FROM ( select companyid, company_name, email, mobile, registerday, status, idle from tbl_company order by registerday desc )V ) T where RNO between #{startRno} and #{endRno}

WITH A AS ( select to_char(logindate,'yyyy') as line_year, count(*) as line_CNT from tbl_member_loginhistory where fk_userid !='admin' group by to_char(logindate,'yyyy') ) SELECT A.line_year, A.line_CNT FROM A CROSS JOIN (SELECT SUM(line_CNT) AS TOTAL FROM A) B order by line_year asc

WITH A AS ( select to_char(logindate,'yyyy-mm') as line_month, count(*) as line_CNT from tbl_member_loginhistory where fk_userid != 'admin' and logindate between #{choice_year}||'-01-01' and #{choice_year}||'-12-31' group by to_char(logindate,'yyyy-mm') ) SELECT A.line_month, A.line_CNT FROM A CROSS JOIN (SELECT SUM(line_CNT) AS TOTAL FROM A) B order by line_month asc

WITH A AS ( SELECT ageGroup, count(*) as ageGroup_CNT FROM ( select trunc(case when to_date(extract(year from sysdate)||substr(birthday,6,2)||substr(birthday,9,2),'yyyymmdd') <= to_date(to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd')) then extract(year from sysdate) - substr(birthday,0,4) else extract(year from sysdate) - substr(birthday,0,4) - 1 end,-1) as ageGroup from tbl_member where userid != 'admin' ) group by ageGroup ) SELECT A.ageGroup||'대' as ageGroup, TO_CHAR( ROUND((A.ageGroup_CNT / B.TOTAL) * 100, 1), '990.0') AS PERCNTAGE FROM A CROSS JOIN (SELECT SUM(ageGroup_CNT) AS TOTAL FROM A) B order by ageGroup asc

WITH A AS ( select gender, count(*) as CNT from tbl_member where userid != 'admin' group by gender ) SELECT A.gender, TO_CHAR( ROUND((A.CNT / B.TOTAL) * 100, 1), '990.0') AS PERCNTAGE FROM A CROSS JOIN (SELECT SUM(CNT) AS TOTAL FROM A) B order by gender asc

select SD.scheduleno , to_char(SD.startdate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') as startdate , to_char(SD.enddate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') as enddate , SD.subject , SD.color , nvl(SD.place,'-') as place , nvl(SD.joinuser,'공유자가 없습니다.') as joinuser , nvl(SD.content,'') as content , SD.fk_smcatgono , SD.fk_lgcatgono , SD.fk_userid , M.user_name , SC.smcatgoname from tbl_calendar_schedule SD JOIN tbl_member M ON SD.fk_userid = M.userid JOIN tbl_calendar_small_category SC ON SD.fk_smcatgono = SC.smcatgono where SD.scheduleno = #{scheduleno}
select smcatgono, fk_lgcatgono, smcatgoname from tbl_calendar_small_category where fk_lgcatgono = 1 order by smcatgono asc

select count(*) from tbl_calendar_schedule where ( to_char(startdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') between #{startdate} and #{enddate} ) and ( to_char(enddate,'YYYY-MM-DD') between #{startdate} and #{enddate} )
and ( fk_lgcatgono = 2 OR fk_userid = #{fk_userid} OR ( fk_userid != #{fk_userid} and lower(joinuser) like '%'||lower(#{fk_userid})||'%' ) )
and ( fk_lgcatgono = 1 AND fk_userid = #{fk_userid} )
and fk_lgcatgono = 1 and fk_userid = #{fk_userid} and lower(joinuser) like '%'||lower(#{searchWord})||'%'

and fk_lgcatgono = 1 and fk_userid = #{fk_userid}
